Function Documentation

function plus ( in  p,
in  q 
)

Overload matlabs function use to add objects.

Add discretization grid objects (add objects value_list vectors). Dimension of p and q must be the same.

Parameters:
p discretization grid object
q discretization grid object
Return values:
r discretization grid object
